fn.p: Abbreviations: ANI, average nucleotide identity; bp, base pairs; cc, clonal complex; ENA, European Nucleotide Archive; LOS, lipooligosaccharide; MLST, multilocus sequence typing; rMLST, ribosomal multilocus sequence typing; ST, sequence type.
All supporting data, code and protocols have been provided within the article or through supplementary data files. Three supplementary tables are available with the online version of this article.
